attributes.action: Funding grants for schools to install solar panels
attributes.additional_details: This is to fit into the government plan of net zero emissions by 2050
attributes.background: Create a scheme for schools to join so that makes getting renewable energy easier

rejection.details:
The Government announced on 21 March 2025 that it would invest in putting solar panels on schools.

You can read more about this on gov.uk: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/great-british-energy-to-cut-bills-for-hospitals-and-schools
